title: Blindfolded Tie
text: I originally tied this for the Shibari Study Kinktober challenge. Its a good exercise for figuring out how to use touch to assess a tie.

title: 2024 Pervert’s Choice Award
text:
It’s a highly unofficial award, with the most chaotic nomination and voting procedure, but still such a lovely way to spread positivity.



A (SFW-ish) picture from each month of 2024

title: Heart Friction Tie
text: See the brief tutorial for how to make the heart-shaped frictions.

title: Panties in a Twist
text: This takes a single 8-meter (6mm) rope for me, but is a very customisable tie since you just use up the ends with the filigree pattern.

title: About
text: I attended my first shibari workshop in October 2023 and quickly became hooked on rope. I’m known for colourful self-tied corsets and intricate improvised designs.

title: Corset Demo
text: I taught this corset at Ropes in Space in 2024. It takes two 8-meter (6mm) ropes for me.

title: I have a website!
text: Hi! I’m starting a website so I have a bit more control over what I post and can put tutorials up in a way that works for me. Be patient while I get things started.

title: Heart Friction Tutorial
text:
I worked this one out from a photo by @sweetangelvixen on Fetlife. I tried tying it the opposite direction to this first, which is possible, but not very easy. Top-to-bottom is definitely easier.
If mobility allows, it’s good to practice this one on your leg, so I did the video from that point of view.

title: Start to Art
text:
I’ve been hinting at an announcement for a few weeks and it’s finally here! TeVincula is organising a 3-day luxury retreat in Scotland (March 28-30) and invited the incredibly talented photographer CapturedErotica and me to teach. We will give workshops on tying decorative designs and functional bondage, then capturing them through artistic photography. I’m so looking forward to seeing what we can create together.
Info and tickets
